title.narrative: Technical Assistance For Integration Of Resilience Dimension Into Strategic Sector Sustainable Development Plans (Ssdp)

description.narrative:
The main objective of the project is that through the CityRAP tool implementation disaster risk and adaptation/ mitigation dimensions will be integrated in LED plans, constituting the basis for a resilient and sustainable local development while promoting the training of local actors and authorities. It will improve quality and effectiveness of the LED cross-cutting approach, providing local governments planning instruments that meet the aspirations of the local population.
By implementing the RAP tool exercise in Cacheu Region, UN-Habitat aims at creating conditions for responding to the lack of technical capacity and experience, lack of data and information and financial resources by reinforcing capacity, transfer skills and tools to local technicians. Also, leveraging local knowledge and information through participatory approach to kicksart processes to shape a resilience framework action cooperating and so to build a more resilient community

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Improved quality and effectiveness of the LED cross-cutting approach with a view to providing local governments with planning instruments that meet the aspirations of the local population by integrating the dimensions of disaster risk management and adaptation / mitigation of CityRAP into LED.
